last_episode_to_air.name: The Whirlwind
last_episode_to_air.overview: Frank, Pilgrim, Madani, Russo, Amy, Curt and the Schultz family. No bullet is left unspent as season two comes to an explosive conclusion.

name: Marvel's The Punisher
overview: A former Marine out to punish the criminals responsible for his family's murder finds himself ensnared in a military conspiracy.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A former Marine out to punish the criminals responsible for his family's murder finds himself ensnared in a military conspiracy.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Frank strives to protect a teenager caught in a sinister conspiracy while doing whatever it takes -- and then some -- to end Russo once and for all.

episodes.name: 3AM
episodes.overview: Former Marine Frank Castle takes the law into his own hands while struggling to come to terms with his traumatic past.

episodes.name: Two Dead Men
episodes.overview: A mysterious phone call forces Frank's hand. Meanwhile, Madani goes digging for suspects and Curtis delivers a message.

episodes.name: Kandahar
episodes.overview: Frank skips the subtlety while interrogating Micro. Brutal memories of top-secret missions shed light on Frank's past.

episodes.name: Resupply
episodes.overview: Madani and Sam plan a delicate operation, Curtis tries to connect with Lewis, and Frank encourages Micro to get his hands dirty.

episodes.name: Gunner
episodes.overview: Frank and Micro go looking for answers from a reluctant witness. Madani and Sam learn of a looming investigation. Rawlins sees a ghost.

episodes.name: The Judas Goat
episodes.overview: With Frank in bad shape, Micro calls on Curtis for help. Madani and Russo continue to mix business with pleasure. Lewis stands up for his rights.

episodes.name: Crosshairs
episodes.overview: Lewis struggles with the ramifications of his actions. Frank and Micro pursue another face from the past. Madani and Sam go bug hunting.

episodes.name: Cold Steel
episodes.overview: Russo opens up to Madani about his past, Sarah shares her concerns about her son with Frank, and a decoy operation takes a turn.

episodes.name: Front Toward Enemy
episodes.overview: Following a deadly explosion, Karen lands in a bomber's crosshairs -- and Frank isn't happy about it. Meanwhile, Curtis makes a grisly discovery.

episodes.name: Virtue of the Vicious
episodes.overview: An attack on a high-profile politician is examined (and reexamined) through different perspectives. Madani faces a painful truth.

episodes.name: Danger Close
episodes.overview: As danger knocks on Sarah's door, Frank takes his quest for vengeance to the next level with some help from an unexpected ally.

episodes.name: Home
episodes.overview: Frank makes a damning confession. A shootout leaves Sarah wondering what to believe. Rawlins goes in for the kill, once and for all.

episodes.name: Memento Mori
episodes.overview: As the authorities close in, an exhausted but unbroken Frank vows to put an end to the war that has consumed his life.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: A former Marine out to punish the criminals responsible for his family's murder finds himself ensnared in a military conspiracy.

episodes.name: Roadhouse Blues
episodes.overview: While driving through Michigan, Frank stops for a beer at a roadside bar. But staying out of trouble has never been his strong suit.

episodes.name: Fight or Flight
episodes.overview: Frank and a reluctant Rachel go on the run as a menacing adversary gives chase. Meanwhile, Madani pays Russo an unwelcome visit.

episodes.name: Trouble the Water
episodes.overview: As Pilgrim's past comes into focus, Frank and Rachel find themselves in police custody, where they're anything but safe.

episodes.name: Scar Tissue
episodes.overview: Rachel recalls the night everything changed and lets Frank in on the truth about her name. Russo sits down with a face from his childhood.

episodes.name: One-Eyed Jacks
episodes.overview: It's not a trap if you know it's coming: That's Frank's philosophy. Madani opens up and Pilgrim plans a visit to an unholy land.

episodes.name: Nakazat
episodes.overview: Amy (formerly Rachel) develops photographs that point to a conspiracy. Russo reads his own report. Madani's story about Russo comes under fire.

episodes.name: One Bad Day
episodes.overview: Madani's quest to ID Pilgrim hits a wall. Russo and his crew put their plan into action. Frank encounters someone from the past.

episodes.name: My Brother's Keeper
episodes.overview: Painful memories take ahold of Russo. Frank's frustration frightens those closest to him. Madani receives a visitor bearing a warning.

episodes.name: Flustercluck
episodes.overview: A big bounty inspires New York's worst to pursue the Punisher. A restless Amy seeks help from a fellow grifter. Russo and Krista consider the future.

episodes.name: The Dark Hearts of Men
episodes.overview: As Madani and Krista debate who's worth saving, Frank prepares to storm Russo's territory. A brutal encounter pushes Pilgrim back into old habits.

episodes.name: The Abyss
episodes.overview: Amy rushes to protect Frank, who lies defenseless in a hospital. Pilgrim gets some crushing news, and Karen Page calls in a favor.

episodes.name: Collision Course
episodes.overview: Buckle up -- Mahoney and Frank are about to take a ride to remember. Amy makes an entrance, Russo cashes out, and Madani comes clean to Krista.

episodes.name: The Whirlwind
episodes.overview: Frank, Pilgrim, Madani, Russo, Amy, Curt and the Schultz family. No bullet is left unspent as season two comes to an explosive conclusion.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Frank strives to protect a teenager caught in a sinister conspiracy while doing whatever it takes -- and then some -- to end Russo once and for all.
